:::: {.content-hidden unless-format="revealjs"}
#### Add use cases

{{< include /guide/configuration/_use-cases.qmd >}}

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa gear >}} Settings**.

1. Under Workspace, select **Organization**.

1. Click **{{< fa plus >}} Add New Use Case** under Use Cases.

1. Enter in the **[title]{.smallcaps}** and select a **[category]{.smallcaps}** for your use case.

1. Click **{{< fa plus >}} Add Use Case** to save your changes.

   After you save, confirm that the use case was added as a new entry in alphabetical order.
